channel.title: Can someone help me with this?
channel.description: ok i have been looking around fr a tut but havent found one so i came to moparscape :). i wa wondering how to to add some stuff. 1. i wanted to make some skulls. but they change. (ex. 0 kills player has regular white pvp skull, 2 kill streak player gets bronze bh skull, 4 kill streak player has 2nd bh skull, 6 kill streak player gets green bh skull, 8 kill streak blue bh skull, 10 kill streak is red bh skull. 2. i would also like to add custom drops to the players with those skulls. lik a player with a red skull would drop a vls if he had it or not. Please help me (im using PI)

item.title: Can someone help me with this?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ok i have been looking around fr a tut but havent found one so i came to moparscape :). i wa wondering how to to add some stuff.

  1. i wanted to make some skulls. but they change. (ex. 0 kills player has regular white pvp skull, 2 kill streak player gets bronze bh skull, 4 kill streak player has 2nd bh skull, 6 kill streak player gets green bh skull, 8 kill streak blue bh skull, 10 kill streak is red bh skull.
  2. i would also like to add custom drops to the players with those skulls. lik a player with a red skull would drop a vls if he had it or not.
    Please help me (im using PI)

Read full topic
